H0.text: Who is Head of State of New Zealand. Queen Elizabeth

H1.text: Who is Head of State of New Zealand. Prime Minister of New Zealand

H2.text: Who is Head of State of New Zealand. Governor-General of New Zealand

H3.text: Who is Head of State of New Zealand. E2R

A4.text: the Constitution Act 1986 explicitly identifies the monarch as New Zealand's head of state

A5.text: the governor-general has been described by academics and politicians as the de facto head of state

A6.text: All executive authority is vested in the King, and his assent is required for parliament to enact laws

A7.text: the governor-general... represents the monarch in Niue, carrying out all the monarch's constitutional and ceremonial duties of state on their behalf
